name: Fight for New York!
description:
Fight for New York! is a battle RPG, based in a modern-fantasy rendition of the big apple. Players form squads of the city's strongest fighters to face off and defend their home.

  • 12 Characters to grab from the Gacha store with more being added in future updates
  • Build your team and fight against friends and foes in a showdown
  • Complete daily quests to earn premium currency for the Gacha store
